required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Time-course of Mitochondrial Biogenic Gene and Protein Expression in Exercised Human Skeletal Muscle
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Exercise Intensity on the Time-course of Mitochondrial Biogenic Gene and Protein Expression in Human Skeletal Muscle.

brief_summary.textblock: This study examines the impact of exercise intensity on the 12-hour time-course of mitochondrial biogenic gene and protein expression in human skeletal muscle. Briefly, participants will perform two experimental sessions involving an acute bout of work-matched low- or high-intensity interval cycling exercise in a randomized crossover fashion, two weeks apart. Skeletal muscle biopsies will be obtained from the vastus lateralis (3 from each leg) before and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise. Changes in the expression of various transcription factors and mitochondrial proteins will be examined at the mRNA and protein level to determine the time-course of changes in these factors differs between exercise protocols of different intensities.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in peroxisome proliferator activated receptor (PPAR) gamma co-activator 1-alpha (PGC-1α) messenger ribonucleic acid (mRNA) expression
primary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
primary_outcome.description: PGC-1α gene expression (indirect indicator of PGC-1α activity). Transcriptional co-activator involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: PGC-1α protein content

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in nuclear factor-erythroid 2 like 2 (Nrf2) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: Nrf2 gene expression (indirect indicator of Nrf2 activity). Transcription factor involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: Nrf2 protein content

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: PPAR-beta gene expression (indirect indicator of PPAR-beta activity). Transcription factor involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in estrogen related receptor (ERR)-gamma mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: ERR-gamma gene expression. Transcription factor involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in leucine-rich pentatricopeptide repeat containing protein 130 (LRP130) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: LRP130 gene expression. Transcriptional co-activator and RNA-binding protein involved in the transcriptional control and stabilization of mitochondrial mRNAs

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: LRP130 protein content

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in nuclear respiratory factor-1 (NRF-1) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: NRF-1 gene expression. Transcription factor involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: NRF-1 protein content

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mitochondrial transcription factor A (TFAM) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: TFAM gene expression. Transcription factor controlling the expression of mitochondrial-encoded genes.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: TFAM protein content

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: p53 gene expression. Transcription factor involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cytochrome c oxidase subunit 4 (COXIV) mRNA expression.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: COXIV gene expression. Nuclear encoded subunit of the electron transport chain complex 4 (COX)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: COXI gene expression. Mitochondrial encoded subunit of the electron transport chain complex IV (COX)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: COXII gene expression.Mitochondrial encoded subunit of the electron transport chain complex IV (COX).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide (NADH) subunit 1 (ND1) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: ND1 gene expression. Mitochondrial encoded subunit of the electron transport chain complex 1 (NADH dehydrogenase)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: ND4 gene expression. Mitochondrial encoded subunit of the electron transport chain complex 1 (NADH dehydrogenase).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in citrate synthase (CS) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: CS gene expression. The first rate limiting enzyme of the Kreb's cycle.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: NRF-2 gene expression. Transcription factor involved in the control of mitochondrial biogenesis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mitochondrial transcription factor B1 (TFB1M) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise to 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: TFB1M gene expression. Transcription factor controlling the expression of mitochondrial-encoded genes.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mitochondrial transcription factor B2 (TFB2M) mRNA expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before exercise and 1, 3, 6, 9, and 12 hours post-exercise
secondary_outcome.description: TFB2M gene expression. Transcription factor controlling the expression of mitochondrial-encoded genes.

arm_group.description: low-intensity exercise session followed by a high-intensity exercise session separated by a minimum of 14 days
high-intensity exercise session followed by a low-intensity exercise session separated by a minimum of 14 days

intervention.description: Participants will perform an acute bout of low-intensity cycling (11 x 1 min intervals at ~73% of peak aerobic work rate interspersed with 1 min recovery periods)
Participants will perform an acute bout of high-intensity cycling (8 x 1 min intervals at ~100% of peak aerobic work rate interspersed with 1 min recovery periods)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- recreationally active (no more than three hours of structured weekly physical activity)
- not currently involved in a systematic training program for improving cardiorespiratory fitness, muscular strength, and/or sport-specific skills
- body mass index < 30 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- presence of cardiometabolic disease
- taking regular prescription medication for the treatment of cardiometabolic disease
- current cigarette smoker

overall_official.affiliation: School of Kinesiology and Health Studies
